name: needle_needle_list_collections
description: List Needle collections. Returns maximum of 20 results. Get more results by increasing the offset.

offset.description: The offset to start listing from. Default is 0.

name: needle_needle_get_collection
description: Get details about a specific Needle collection.

collection_id.description: The ID of the collection to get.

name: needle_needle_get_collection_stats
description: Get statistics about a specific Needle collection.

collection_id.description: The ID of the collection to get stats for.

name: needle_needle_list_collection_files
description: List files in a specific Needle collection. Returns maximum of 100 results. Get more results by increasing the offset.

collection_id.description: The ID of the collection to list files for.

offset.description: The offset to start listing from. Default is 0.

name: needle_needle_add_file_to_collection
description: Add a file to a specific Needle collection.

collection_id.description: The ID of the collection to add a file to.

name.description: The name of the file to add.

url.description: The URL of the file to add. To add files with inline data, use the data URL format: data:<mime-type>;base64,<data>

name: needle_needle_delete_file_from_collection
description: Delete a file from a specific Needle collection.

collection_id.description: The ID of the collection to delete a file from.

file_id.description: The ID of the file to delete.

name: needle_needle_search_collection
description: Perform a semantic search on a specific Needle collection. Returns maximum of 10 results. Get more results by increasing the offset.

collection_id.description: The ID of the collection to search.

offset.description: The offset to start searching from. Default is 0.

name.description: The name of the collection to create.
